projects.title: VN Game
projects.body: A 1-bit horror visual novel made using RenPy for a halloween themed game jam.

projects.title: PIXIV Image Downloader
projects.body: A scraping tool to download user artworks on the PIXIV Website using C# and Selenium. Currently a work in progress.

projects.title: Research Paper: Detecting Biodegradable Materials in Waste Piles Using YOLO Object Detection Model
projects.body: Thesis paper during university studying the effectiveness of real-time object detection for garbage segregation.

designs.title: Travel Webpage
designs.body: A web design of a travel webpage to practice responsive ui/ux.

designs.title: Peo Redesign
designs.body: A redesign of a vtuber's website to practice responsive ui/ux.

designs.body: The GitHub repository for this website.
